# generalCategory

**Instance Property**

The general category (most usual classification) of the scalar.

## Declaration

```swift
var generalCategory: Unicode.GeneralCategory { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the “General_Category” property in the [http://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/].
title: generalCategory
